screens.origins_gacha.no_origins_layer.d: Ye need to 'ave the origins:origins layer in yer sea or this 'ere vessel can't sail.
buttons.origins_gacha.roll.not_enough: Ye must bequeath %s more orbs o' origin to roll yer fate! (%s/%s)
